extension.name: Community - Latest Members from Given Groups

extension.description: Show the latest members for given groups

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: updated_avatar_only
param.label: Updated avatar only
param.description: Show users with updated avatar only.

param.name: tooltips
param.label: Use Tooltips
param.description: Select to choose whether to show the tooltips or not.

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of online user(s) to display (default is 10)

param.name: loadmootools
param.label: Load mootools
param.description: Select YES for the module to load mootools, and NO to rely on the template to load it
